text: Charlotte Valandrey (29 November 1968 – 13 July 2022) was a French actress and author. Valandrey's first movie role was in the 1985 political drama Red Kiss. In 1986, she appeared in the music video for David Bowie's song "As The World Falls Down". Valandrey died on 13 July 2022 at a hospital in Paris from problems caused by heart surgery at the age of 53.INFO CLOSER.
